original_title: In the Beginning: Abraham the Forefather
overview: ABRAHAM THE FOREFATHER, Volume 4 (Ages 6-16). ABRAHAM THE FOREFATHER, Episode Four of In The Beginning Bible Series , God rewards his just servant, Abraham, by calling him into the wilderness as the forefather of a great nation, whose descendants "will out number the sands of the earth."
title: In the Beginning: Abraham the Forefather
